entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
